sentences.en: Aerodynamic ( passive ) instability is a disadvantage for manned vehicles.
sentences.cn: 气动力 ( 被动 ) 稳定对于载人飞行器是不利的.

sentences.en: Combustion instability continues to plague development efforts.
sentences.cn: 燃烧不稳定仍然阻碍研制工作的发展.

sentences.en: Critics point to the continuing instability of the company.
sentences.cn: 评论家们强调公司的形势继续不稳.

sentences.en: If indications of instability are obtained, the results are checked experimentally.
sentences.cn: 如果得到了不稳定的征侯, 就用试验来校验结果.

sentences.en: Instability may arise at times of change.
sentences.cn: 变革时期可能会出现动乱.

sentences.en: Intermediate frequency instability has had the most uneven history.
sentences.cn: 中频不稳定性的研究经历了极为曲折的道路.

sentences.en: It is only when money wages move that instability declares itself.
sentences.cn: 只有当货币工资移动时,不稳定才会出现.

sentences.en: Much of the instability stems from the economic effects of the war.
sentences.cn: 不稳定局面多半是由战争对经济的影响造成的。

sentences.en: Racism causes political instability and violence.
sentences.cn: 种族主义道致政治动荡和暴力事件.

sentences.en: The election will take place against a backdrop of increasing instability.
sentences.cn: 选举将在愈加动荡不安的局势下举行。

sentences.en: The length of the fuselage was increased due to a degree of directional instability.
sentences.cn: 由于存在某种程度的航向不稳定性，机身被加长了。

sentences.en: The net result can be greater instability in domestic prices.
sentences.cn: 最后结果就是国内价格可能更不稳定.

sentences.en: To some extent this instability is a result of gross overorganizing.
sentences.cn: 这种不稳定现象在某种程度上是由于粗率和过度组织所造成的.

sentences.en: Water may serve as a type of instability.
sentences.cn: 水可以作为不稳定性的象征.

words.tran_cn: [气象]不稳定（性）；基础薄弱；不安定

trans.tran_cn: 不稳定，不稳固，不坚决，反复无常，基础薄弱
trans.tran_en: when a situation is not certain because there is the possibility of sudden change
